de.hs_duesseldorf.medien.mi.httphsdronelog.hsdronelog.network.request

Class Request

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.hs_duesseldorf.medien.mi.httphsdronelog.hsdronelog.network.request.Request
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BatteryRequest, ChecklistElementRequest, ChecklistRequest, DashboardRequest, DroneRequest, FlightRequest, IndexRequest, MessageRequest, UserRequest

    public abstract class Request
extends Object
    The Request class provides a flexible use of Requests in the Network. The NetworkThread uses this class to determine the data send over the network to a specific php location.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private boolean m_deleteSession
      If the session should be deleted when starting the network request.
      private String m_identificationTag
      This tag is used to identify the request type.
      private boolean m_isInitialized
      This boolean describes if the type of the request was set or not.
      private ByteArrayOutputStream m_postRequestData
      The post request data is a byte stream which contains all the information which should be send to the web server.
      private String m_relativePathToPhpString
      the relativ path to the php for this request.
      private NetworkRequestParser m_requestParser
      The parser for this request to parse the result of this request into a format the network listener can deal with.
      private boolean m_sendSession
      If the session should be send or not

    • Field Detail

      • m_isInitialized

        private boolean m_isInitialized
        This boolean describes if the type of the request was set or not.

      • m_identificationTag

        private String m_identificationTag
        This tag is used to identify the request type. This value should be set by subclasses with a public static variable so that the user can check for request type.

      • m_sendSession

        private boolean m_sendSession
        If the session should be send or not

      • m_relativePathToPhpString

        private String m_relativePathToPhpString
        the relativ path to the php for this request.

      • m_postRequestData

        private ByteArrayOutputStream m_postRequestData
        The post request data is a byte stream which contains all the information which should be send to the web server.

      • m_deleteSession

        private boolean m_deleteSession
        If the session should be deleted when starting the network request.

      • m_requestParser

        private NetworkRequestParser m_requestParser
        The parser for this request to parse the result of this request into a format the network listener can deal with.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Request

        public Request(NetworkRequestParser requestParser)
        throws IllegalArgumentException
        Creates a new Request with default values
        Parameters:
        requestParser - The parser for this request. The parser will parse the result of the request into a format the network listener can deal with.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the parser value is null

    • Method Detail

      • sendSession

        public boolean sendSession()
        Gets the send session string.
        Returns:
        The send session boolean for the network request. True if the session shoulb be send over network.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - If the request type was not specified.

      • identificationTag

        public String identificationTag()
        Gets the send session string.
        Returns:
        The identification tag of the request. This can be used to identify the request in detail. Look at subclasses public static variables to get the reference value.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - If the request type was not specified.

      • relativePathToPhpString

        public String relativePathToPhpString()
        Gets the relative path to php string.
        Returns:
        The relative path to php string for the network request.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - If the request type was not specified.

      • postRequestData

        public ByteArrayOutputStream postRequestData()
        Gets the post request string.
        Returns:
        The post request data for the network request. This stream contains all the content which should be sent to the web server.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - If the request type was not specified.

      • deleteSession

        public boolean deleteSession()
        Gets the delete session boolean.
        Returns:
        The delete session boolean for the network request. If true, the session will be deleted at the beginning of the network request.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - If the request type was not specified.

      • requestParser

        public NetworkRequestParser requestParser()
        Gets the network request parser instance.
        Returns:
        The network request parser instance for the network request. This objet will parse the result of the request into a format the network listener can deal with.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - If the request type was not specified.

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object

      • setRequestData

        void setRequestData(boolean sendSession,
                    String identificationTag,
                    String relativePathToPhpString,
                    ByteArrayOutputStream postRequestData,
                    boolean deleteSession)
             throws IllegalArgumentException
        Sets the data of a new request for the network thread.
        Parameters:
        sendSession - Determines if the id of the session should also be send.
        identificationTag - The tag to identify the current request. This value has to be unique for each request.
        relativePathToPhpString - The relative path on the web server to the php file.
        postRequestData - The Data to send over the network with the POST method of HTTP.
        deleteSession - If the current session should be deleted when the network requests starts. Only set this value to true if the request is the logout request.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If one of the values is null
        IllegalArgumentException

      • byteArrayOutputStream

        ByteArrayOutputStream byteArrayOutputStream(String content)
                                     throws IllegalStateException
        Creates a ByteArrayOutputStream from the given content.
        Parameters:
        content - The content which should be add to the stream.
        Returns:
        An instance of the ByteArrayOutputStream class which contains the given content.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If content is null or contains null

      • byteArrayOutputStream

        ByteArrayOutputStream byteArrayOutputStream(String content,
                                            android.graphics.Bitmap image)
                                     throws IllegalStateException
        Creates a ByteArrayOutputStream from the given content.
        Parameters:
        content - The content which should be add to the stream.
        image - The image to be uploaded. Note that the image attribute name has to be added to the content's end. It will not be added in this method.
        Returns:
        An instance of the ByteArrayOutputStream class which contains. the given content.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If content is null or image is null

      • checkIfInitialized

        private void checkIfInitialized()
        Checks if the request type was specified and so all necessary components are initialized.
